resources.string: Isy is a system, developed thinking in the deaf community. Its main function is to vibrate the phone when detect a sound louder than the ambient sound. At "Tolerance" settings, you can define the sound tolerance level, the higher the tolerance, higher the sound must be to vibrate the cell phone. Isy considers a high volume when it is greater than the volume of the environment, and for this, it uses a range of sampling time, that is configured in "Reference time". The main screen of the system is a gift, detecting the height and length of the sound, it is drawn circles on the screen in different sizes and colors, to allow to "see" the sound in a different way.
